SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractPlayer
An abstract class representing a player in the game.
Board
Represents the game board for Othello, a two-player strategy game.
BoardTest
JUnit test class for the Board class.
ClientHandler
Represents a client handler responsible for managing communication with an individual client in the Othello game server.
ClientTest
JUnit test class for the OthelloClient class, which represents the client-side functionality of the Othello game application, including interactions with the server.
ClientTUI
The text-based user interface (TUI) for the Othello game client.
ClientUnavailableException
Signals that a client is unavailable or cannot be reached.
ClientView
Defines the contract for a client's view in an Othello game.
ComputerPlayer
Represents a computer player in the Othello game.
Controller
The main controller class that manages the flow of the Othello game application, following the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern.
ExitView
Represents the controller for the ExitScene FXML file in the Othello game application.
Game
The Game interface represents the contract for the Othello game.
GameInstructionsView
Represents the controller for the GameInstructionsScene FXML file in the Othello game application.
GameTest
JUnit test class for the OthelloGame logic, including player moves, game state, and win conditions.
GUI
The GUI (Graphical User Interface) class is the entry point for the Othello game application.
HumanPlayer
Represents a human player in the Othello game.
Mark
Represents the possible states of a cell on the Othello game board.
MenuView
Represents the view for the main menu in the Othello game application.
Model
Represents the model of the Othello game application, following the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern.
Move
Represents a move in the Othello game.
NaiveStrategy
Represents a naive strategy for a computer player in the Othello game.
OfflinePlayingMainView
Represents the controller for the OfflinePlayingMainScene FXML file in the Othello game application.
OfflinePlayingView
Represents the controller for the OfflinePlayingScene FXML file in the Othello game application.
OthelloClient
Represents a client for the Othello game.
OthelloGame
Represents an instance of the Othello game, including the game board, players, and game logic.
OthelloMove
Represents a move in the Othello game.
OthelloServer
Represents the main server for handling Othello game connections.
Player
Represents a participant in the Othello game.
PlayerAndStrategyTest
JUnit test class for the interaction between different player implementations and strategies in the Othello game.
Protocol
Defines constants for the communication protocol between the server and clients in the Othello game system.
ProtocolException
Exception thrown to indicate a protocol-related error.
ServerGame
Extension of the OthelloGame class for server-side game management.
ServerHandler
Represents a handler for communication with the Othello game server.
ServerTest
JUnit test class for testing the functionality of the server in a server-client interaction using the Othello game protocol.
ServerTUI
Text-based user interface (TUI) implementation for the Othello game server.
ServerUnavailableException
Exception thrown to indicate that the server is currently unavailable.
ServerView
Interface representing the view for the Othello game server.
SmartStrategy
Represents a smart strategy for a computer player in the Othello game.
Sound
Manages audio playback for different events in the Othello game application.
Strategy
Represents a strategy for determining moves in the Othello game.
ThankYouView
Represents the controller for the ThankYouScene FXML file in the Othello game application.
TUI
The TUI (Text-based User Interface) class provides a console-based interface for playing the Othello game.
UserExitRequestException
Exception thrown to indicate a user-initiated exit request.
